content: If you only stick to the main story in Black Myth: Wukong, you're going to miss out on a lot of the content the game has to offer. The world is packed with secrets including NPCs and their side quests that reward unique items, hidden areas, and secret bosses. If you want to fill out every record in your journal and collect all of those trophies, here's a list of all the secrets we've found across the chapters.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md", under the primary heading "Secrets in Black Myth Wukong". The content is presented below:

If you only stick to the main story in Black Myth: Wukong, you're going to miss out on a lot of the content the game has to offer. The world is packed with secrets including NPCs and their side quests that reward unique items, hidden areas, and secret bosses. If you want to fill out every record in your journal and collect all of those trophies, here's a list of all the secrets we've found across the chapters.
